      • perform

        public <RequestType extends Request,ResponseType extends Response> ResponseType perform(java.lang.String endpoint,
                                                                                        RequestType request,
                                                                                        java.lang.Class<ResponseType> responseClass)
                                                                                 throws HttpRosetteAPIException
        Type Parameters:
        RequestType - the type of the request object.
        ResponseType - the type of the response object.
        Parameters:
        endpoint - which endpoint.
        request - the data for the request.
        responseClass - the Java Class object for the response object.
        Returns:
        the response.
        Throws:
        HttpRosetteAPIException - for an error returned from the Rosette API.
        RosetteRuntimeException - for other errors, such as communications problems with HTTP.
